name: jyotiflow-database-tools
description: Database analysis and cleanup tools for JyotiFlow

scripts.db:full-cleanup: npm run db:analyze && npm run db:fix && npm run db:clean-migrations
scripts.db:test-connection: node -e "require('pg').Client({connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL}).connect().then(() => console.log('✅ Database connected')).catch(e => console.error('❌', e.message))"
